In England, in the seven days to 01 February, there were 550,430 new confirmed cases (973.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 January, there were 627,502 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 12% (77,072 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 February is 15,282,993 (27,025.6 cases per 100,000 population).
